note: Daughter of the Mitten State. Passionate about dogs, books, and kindness. Unapologetically woke. Really would like everyone to just calm down a bit.

fields.name: Reading
fields.value: The Lost City of Z, by David Grann

fields.name: Hobbies
fields.value: Dogs, books, native plants, cooking. Trying my hand at indoor gardening for the first time with a grow tent in the basement.
